metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0183 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Linux contains a vulnerability in the kernelmode layer where an out-of-bounds write can lead to denial of service anddata tampering.

criterions.comment: nvidia-graphics-drivers-304: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
nvidia-graphics-drivers-340: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
nvidia-graphics-drivers-384: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
